text: Itte yaru ga i. `Arra wa kore o kinji rareta to shogen dekiru, anata gata no shonin o tsurete ki nasai.' Tatoe kare-ra ga shogen shite mo, anata wa kare-ra to issho ni shogen shite wa naranai. Mata waga shirushi o itsuwaridearu to suru mono no, munashi yobo ni shitagatte wa naranai. Kare-ra wa raise o shinjinaide, mata kare-ra no omo ni doi no mono o haisuru mono tachidearu
